bin.control

Class FXController

  • java.lang.Object
    • bin.control.FXController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GamePlayController, MainMenuController, SettingsMenuController

    public abstract class FXController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Interface for JavaFX controllers.

    Dmitriy Meleshko

      • parent

        private javafx.scene.Parent parent
        Interface object of controller's .fxml. Is used to "look for" elements by fx:id.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Implements Initializable.initialize(URL, ResourceBundle).

        From abstract method:

        Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
        resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

      • getLocaleStr

        protected java.lang.String getLocaleStr(java.lang.String key)

      • setParent

        public void setParent(javafx.scene.Parent parent)
        Setter for private field parent.
        Parameters:
        parent - new property

      • init

        public abstract void init()
        Alternative for method initialize in standard JavaFX controllers. But, there's a difference. When Main.changeScene(String, String) changes scene - this method activates.

      • registerElements

        public void registerElements()
        Sets all fields annotated as FXMLLink to real links with .fxml elements.
